text: Steven G. Horwitz (February 7, 1964 â€“ June 27, 2021) was an American economist of the Austrian School. Horwitz was the Distinguished Professor of Free Enterprise in the Department of Economics in the Miller College of Business at Ball State University. In 2017, he retired as the Dana Professor of Economics Emeritus at St. Lawrence University. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Economics videos Category:1964 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American economists Category:Academics from Indiana Category:Scientists from Detroit Category:Writers from Detroit Category:Academics from New York (state)
